src:
Ketiak Firmino Offside, Jurgen Klopp: Jangan Tertawa!
03 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jurgen Klopp tampaknya benar-benar tidak memahami keputusan wasit yang menganulir gol Roberto Firmino ke gawang Aston Villa. Bos Liverpool ini mulai mempertanyakan kualitas VAR di Premier League.
Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB kemarin, Liverpool menuntaskan comeback dramatis untuk mengalahkan Villa 2-1. Gol Andrew Robertson dan Sadio Mane di ujung pertandingan berhasil menyelamatkan The Reds.
Kemenangan ini penting, Liverpool masih nyaman di puncak klasemen sementara dengan keunggulan 6 poin dari Man City. Biar begitu, kemenangan ini seharusnya datang lebih mudah jika gol Firmino disahkan.
Klopp merasa keputusan offside Firmino ini benar-benar aneh. Mengapa demikian? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Offside Firmino armpit, Jurgen Klopp: Don't Laugh!
Nov 3 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Jurgen Klopp doesn't seem to fully understand the referee's decision to annul Roberto Firmino's goal against Aston Villa. The Liverpool boss is starting to question the quality of VAR in the Premier League.
Saturday (11/02/2019) night WIB yesterday, Liverpool completed a dramatic comeback to beat Villa 2-1. Andrew Robertson and Sadio Mane's goals at the end of the match saved the Reds.
This victory is important, Liverpool are still comfortable at the top of the standings with a 6-point advantage from Man City. Even so, this victory should have come easier if Firmino's goal was passed.
Klopp felt Firmino's offside decision was really strange. Why is that? Read below, Bolaneters!
